select hs.*, h.name as hospital_name from hospital_supplier hs inner join hospital h on hs.hospital_id = h.id
and h.name like concat( '%', #{request.keywords}, '%')
and hs.supplier_id = #{request.supplierId}
and hs.inactive = 0

select s.id as supplier_id, s.name as supplier_name from hospital_supplier hs inner join supplier s on hs.supplier_id = s.id
and s.name like concat( '%', #{request.keywords}, '%')
and hs.hospital_id = #{request.hospitalId}
and hs.inactive = 0
